sn35.135:4.1: “You’re fortunate, mendicants, so very fortunate, to have the opportunity to live the spiritual life.
sn35.135:4.2: I’ve seen the hell called ‘the six fields of contact’.
sn35.135:4.3: There, whatever sight you see with your eye is unlikable, not likable;
sn35.135:4.10: Whatever phenomenon you cognize with your mind is unlikable, not likable;
sn35.135:4.13: You’re fortunate, mendicants, so very fortunate, to have the opportunity to live the spiritual life.
sn35.135:4.14: I’ve seen the heaven called ‘the six fields of contact’.
sn35.135:4.15: There, whatever sight you see with your eye is likable, not unlikable;
sn35.135:4.19: Whatever phenomenon you cognize with your mind is likable, not unlikable;
sn35.135:4.22: You’re fortunate, mendicants, so very fortunate, to have the opportunity to live the spiritual life.”
